name: ryanair-europe-airports-map
description: Interactive map of European airports served by Ryanair

scripts.copy:assets: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); ['index.html', 'manifest.json', 'offline.html'].forEach(file => fs.cpSync(file, 'dist/' + file, {recursive:true, force:true})); ['assets', 'data'].forEach(dir => fs.cpSync(dir, 'dist/' + dir, {recursive:true, force:true}));"
scripts.build: bun run build:server && bun run build:frontend && bun run build:sw && bun run copy:assets
